2020-10-13-newcastle.name: newcastle
2020-10-13-newcastle.going:
GOING TAPETA: STANDARD TO SLOW (Showers)
Stalls 1m4f - Outside; 2m - Inside; Straight - Centre

races.name: Watch Free Race Replays On attheraces.com Handicap
races.verdict: Look no further than last week's emphatic Catterick winner ATAILOF TWO CITIES. She has thrived since introduced to headgear (visor).

nags.name: Wemyss Point
nags.rp_comment: Capable handicap hurdler (133 rated); disappointing on AW since wind surgery; best watched

nags.name: Baladio
nags.rp_comment: 12-race maiden; found a Class 4 handicap too competitive at Nottingham last time; stamina?

nags.name: War Empress
nags.rp_comment: Boasts plenty of placed form, including recently on the Polytrack at Kempton (2m).

nags.name: Indian Vision
nags.rp_comment: Shaped respectably (fourth) on return at Musselburgh in July; disappointing subsequently.

nags.name: Heavenly Tale
nags.rp_comment: Seemingly resented the hood at Ayr (1m2f); stamina reserves are a complete unknown at 2m.

nags.name: Atailof Two Cities
nags.rp_comment: Emphatic 22l winner at Catterick (2m, soft) last week; well weighted under 6lb penalty.

nags.name: Gripper
nags.rp_comment: Encouragement drawn from improved effort over jumps at Perth (2m4f), yet others preferred.

nags.name: Flames Of York
nags.rp_comment: Yet to play a positive role in handicaps (0-4); including at Catterick last week; stamina?

nags.name: Eagle's Foot
nags.rp_comment: In the mix (fourth) on handicap debut at Thirsk (1m4f); improvement possible in blinkers.

nags.name: Spycracker
nags.rp_comment: Went close to beating an in-form rival at Musselburgh (1m6f) last time; 5lb higher.

nags.name: Teescomponentsfly
nags.rp_comment: Heavily eased in Haydock maiden (1m3f, soft) six weeks ago; new trip on handicap debut.

nags.name: Gloryella
nags.rp_comment: Poor 15-race maiden; in excess of 81l behind Atailof Two Cities at Catterick last week.

nags.name: High Moor Flyer
nags.rp_comment: Distant third to odds-on favourite at Thirsk (1m4f); unappealing.

nags.name: Bouncing Bobby
nags.rp_comment: Worthy of consideration for minor honours on the strength of recent Catterick form (1m6f).

races.name: Visit attheraces.com Handicap (Div I)
races.verdict: It may be worth siding with JAMIH. He ran well to finish second here last time and is bred to be even better suited by the longer trip.

nags.name: River Glades
nags.rp_comment: Successful in only start at this level but has a lot to prove returning from 516 days off.

nags.name: Bobba Tee
nags.rp_comment: Made it tenth-time lucky over C&D three weeks ago; likely player again off 2lb higher.

nags.name: Greengage
nags.rp_comment: Three wins all came on Tapeta last winter including over C&D could run well.

nags.name: Alborkan
nags.rp_comment: Raised 3lb for Kempton win and a player if coping with the longer trip and new surface.

nags.name: Island Nation
nags.rp_comment: Done well on Polytrack lately but up another 4lb and has to prove himself on this surface.

nags.name: Spantik
nags.rp_comment: Won over 1m2f here 11 days ago; 5lb rise not excessive and should stay 1m4f.

nags.name: El Naseri
nags.rp_comment: 0-8 and has stamina to prove on AW debut; cheekpieces given a go.

nags.name: Monsaraz
nags.rp_comment: Two wins in the summer, but below form lately and still 5lb above his last winning mark.

nags.name: Jamih
nags.rp_comment: Second over 1m2f here last time; pedigree suggests he is well worth a go over this trip.

nags.name: Miracle Eagle
nags.rp_comment: 0-6 but has run better the last twice including when third of eight over C&D last time.

races.name: Visit attheraces.com Handicap (Div II)
races.verdict: An interesting race in which the unexposed 3yo FLOWER OF SCOTLAND (nap) gets the vote ahead of Esspeegee and George Ridsdale.

nags.name: Nataleena
nags.rp_comment: Only 2lb higher than for Ayr win in July and had an excuse on heavy latest; not ruled out

nags.name: Flower Of Scotland
nags.rp_comment: Close fourth on handicap debut at Kempton and she's open to more progress; big player

nags.name: Madeeh
nags.rp_comment: Two wins on turf in July but tailed off the last twice and has quite a lot to prove again

nags.name: Esspeegee
nags.rp_comment: Triple C&D winner and went close back here three weeks ago; key player

nags.name: George Ridsdale
nags.rp_comment: Close third in hat-trick bid latest; still has potential and looks interesting at new trip

nags.name: Hua Mulan
nags.rp_comment: Edging back down the weights but she needs to find some extra spark

nags.name: Ghayyar
nags.rp_comment: Last win was in July 2018 and can only be watched back at this trip on Tapeta debut

nags.name: Vintage Rose
nags.rp_comment: Well handicapped on best form but she's 0-7 and was tailed off at Ayr last time

nags.name: King Charles
nags.rp_comment: Unexposed but needs something of a transformation with blinkers added on handicap debut

nags.name: Jan De Heem
nags.rp_comment: Well treated on his Catterick win last autumn but has struggled in all four runs this term

races.name: Sky Sports Racing Sky 415 EBF Novice Stakes
races.verdict: Neither Ed Walker nor Oisin Murphy are regular Newcastle visitors so we should probably take the hint with the twice-raced COTAI BEAR.

nags.name: Batraan
nags.rp_comment: 85,000gns yearling; slowly away (eighth) on York debut (5.5f, good); form franked since.

nags.name: Cotai Bear
nags.rp_comment: Always handy when narrowly beaten in a driving finish at Kempton (7f) three weeks ago.

nags.name: Main Target
nags.rp_comment: 200,000gns yearling; first foal from French Grp 2 winner Jazzi Top (1m-1m2f); market check

nags.name: Maison De York
nags.rp_comment: In rear, making only modest late headway (seventh) on debut at Thirsk (7f) last month.

nags.name: One Over Par
nags.rp_comment: Weak inside final furlong when fourth over C&D last month; should be on the premises.

nags.name: Secret Eagle
nags.rp_comment: Fourth foal from a modest sprinter (RPR 72); gelded ahead of his introduction to racing.

nags.name: Sir Taweel
nags.rp_comment: Slowly into stride (very inexperienced) when last of 13 on debut at Chelmsford (7f).

nags.name: Smeaton's Light
nags.rp_comment: Pulled hard on the outer when a weakening fifth on Pontefract debut (6f); nurseries await?

nags.name: Stonegarth
nags.rp_comment: Gelded third foal from a maiden dam; half-brother to 6f AW juvenile winner Lady Dancealot.

nags.name: Thornaby Pearl
nags.rp_comment: Keeping on 80-1 fifth on C&D debut (One Over Par fourth); struggled over 5f subsequently.

nags.name: Available Angel
nags.rp_comment: Weakened on debut here (7f) a fortnight ago; appears unlikely to trouble the principals.

nags.name: Sheila's Legacy
nags.rp_comment: Sister to a 5f juvenile winner (RPR 99); excuses on Beverley debut (5f) four weeks ago.

nags.name: Stockingfiller
nags.rp_comment: Raised her game marginally in a 6f novice at Redcar (soft); others are less exposed.

nags.name: Sugar Angel
nags.rp_comment: Sixth foal from an unraced dam; Ruth Carr isn't a regular source of juvenile winners.

races.name: Download The At The Races App Nursery Handicap
races.verdict: It might be worth siding with the well-related DUTCH LIGHT, who looks on a fair opening mark and could appreciate this drop back to 6f.

nags.name: Boogie Time
nags.rp_comment: Ran well in Class 2 at Ayr latest and he's respected on this big drop back in grade

nags.name: Perfect Sign
nags.rp_comment: Runner-up in C&D novice on stable debut and looks interesting on this switch to a nursery

nags.name: Yorkshire Pirlo
nags.rp_comment: Close up in first three runs but well held after slow start on nursery debut at York

nags.name: Fayathaan
nags.rp_comment: Still lightly raced but he needs to kick on again on this return to Tapeta

nags.name: Bodak Yellow
nags.rp_comment: Promising debut at Wolverhampton but has been disappointing since; now makes nursery debut

nags.name: Monza City
nags.rp_comment: Some good efforts in nurseries but she couldn't hang in there last time and is now 0-6

nags.name: Forbidden Beauty
nags.rp_comment: Still unexposed but was behind Monza City last time and she needs to step up on AW debut

nags.name: Pockley
nags.rp_comment: Has penalty for his narrow C&D win but he rallied well to beat a clear second; respected

nags.name: Gaelic Secret
nags.rp_comment: Clear promise in both novice runs; dangerous back up in trip on his nursery/AW debut

nags.name: Penombre
nags.rp_comment: Unexposed but needs to find improvement upped in trip on his nursery/AW debut

nags.name: Mr Trevor
nags.rp_comment: Made solid start to his nursery career when fourth of 16 at Pontefract; in the mix

nags.name: Dutch Light
nags.rp_comment: Well-related filly and she's interesting back in trip off what looks a fair opening mark

nags.name: Shesaheart
nags.rp_comment: Beaten around 5l in both nurseries and has something to prove

races.name: Free Tips Daily On attheraces.com Handicap (Div I)
races.verdict: This open-looking contest may go to BOSTON GEORGE. Second choice is Anif, ahead of Ulshaw Bridge.

nags.name: Humbert
nags.rp_comment: C&D winner who is interesting off a handy mark back here on second start for Roger Fell

nags.name: Mostawaa
nags.rp_comment: Recent turf form is respectable; has won over C&D

nags.name: Turntable
nags.rp_comment: Has enough to prove back on AW

nags.name: Le Chiffre
nags.rp_comment: Still has time on his side; likely player if taking to AW

nags.name: Ulshaw Bridge
nags.rp_comment: Runner-up on last two turf starts; remains well treated on peak form

nags.name: First Response
nags.rp_comment: Possibilities back at this venue, off last winning mark

nags.name: Irv
nags.rp_comment: Two wins at York in summer 2019; far from consistent since

nags.name: Anif
nags.rp_comment: Shaped well at this venue (back from layoff) last time; enters calculations

nags.name: Boston George
nags.rp_comment: Sole win came at this track; ran respectably back here on latest outing

nags.name: Hlaitan
nags.rp_comment: 3yo maiden who comes with risks but may prove suited by this scenario

nags.name: Bravo Faisal
nags.rp_comment: Signs of a revival last time; defied higher marks as a 2yo

nags.name: Destroyer
nags.rp_comment: 0-12 on AW; others preferred

races.name: Free Tips Daily On attheraces.com Handicap (Div II)
races.verdict: An open race in which the vote goes to WILD HOPE, who made a bold bid over C&D 18 days ago and is only 1lb higher here.

nags.name: Starry Eyes
nags.rp_comment: On reduced mark but has something to prove and is untried on Tapeta; others preferred

nags.name: Wild Hope
nags.rp_comment: Has a patchy profile but went close here latest and is a big player if he can back that up

nags.name: Zap
nags.rp_comment: Has finished runner-up on turf/Tapeta the last twice; in the mix again back up in trip

nags.name: Don't Tell Claire
nags.rp_comment: Resumed her progress with a close call at Newmarket; respected up 2lb at this new trip

nags.name: Rousayan
nags.rp_comment: Six turf wins but 0-6 on AW and he didn't really pick up over C&D latest; others preferred

nags.name: Striding Edge
nags.rp_comment: Bounced back with brave win over 1m1f at Hamilton; 3lb higher on this return to Tapeta

nags.name: Global Warning
nags.rp_comment: Finished well for second at Kempton and dangerous if he can back that up back up in trip

nags.name: Gweedore
nags.rp_comment: Good third in bid for 7f hat-trick latest but has looked a bit stretched at 1m in the past

nags.name: Starfighter
nags.rp_comment: Record of 1-19 but interesting to see how he figures in market back at 1m on stable debut

nags.name: Good Night Mr Tom
nags.rp_comment: Went close on his stable debut but that was in a seller and has a lot more to do here

nags.name: Insurplus
nags.rp_comment: Multiple course winner but didn't fire here latest and that took his losing run to 14

races.name: Follow At The Races On Twitter Maiden Stakes
races.verdict: Back from three months off following wind surgery, FUTURE KING looks the one they all have to beat.

nags.name: Followthestars
nags.rp_comment: Sold for 300,000gns as a yearling; likely he'll be one for handicaps further down the line

nags.name: Khulu
nags.rp_comment: First foal of an ordinary sprinter; surely best watched on this belated debut

nags.name: Sharpie
nags.rp_comment: Huge prices and beaten a long way in two starts; expect more of the same

nags.name: Boma Green
nags.rp_comment: Among the favourites two runs since handicapping; leading claims back in maiden company

nags.name: Convertible
nags.rp_comment: Wears blinkers and has been gelded; yard going well but want to see market confidence

nags.name: Desert Palms
nags.rp_comment: Solid effort here latest; may be he's happiest on the AW but has had plenty of chances

nags.name: En Couleur
nags.rp_comment: Good debut on Fibresand in the spring; interesting but likely to want more of a test

nags.name: Future King
nags.rp_comment: Will have learned plenty from his debut and is the one to beat back from wind surgery

nags.name: Nobblyneez
nags.rp_comment: Massive price when tailed off in a Ripon maiden in the summer

nags.name: Palo Santo
nags.rp_comment: Missed the break on his debut here before coming home nicely and is one to keep an eye on

nags.name: Troll Peninsula
nags.rp_comment: Out of a dam who won over this trip for the yard as a 3yo; the most interesting newcomer

nags.name: Emily's Delight
nags.rp_comment: Has looked very moderate in two completed starts thus far; can't be backed

nags.name: Joyfilly
nags.rp_comment: Easy to back and showed nothing on her 6f debut in the spring for Ed Walker

nags.name: She Sure Is
nags.rp_comment: Bit of promise on debut ten days ago; entitled to improve but this again looks beyond her

races.name: attheraces.com Apprentice Handicap
races.verdict: Carlovian can't be knocked out of calculations, but a flier is taken on ROSE BANDIT, a fair 2yo who's back on a workable mark.

nags.name: Lucky Beggar
nags.rp_comment: Not as good latest but has a patchy record on Fibresand and will be happier back on Tapeta

nags.name: Zebulon
nags.rp_comment: Has two wins and three near-misses to his name in eight starts over C&D should go well

nags.name: Kilconquhar
nags.rp_comment: Disappointing for David O'Meara and made poor start for his new yard three weeks ago

nags.name: Gina D'Cleaner
nags.rp_comment: Tailed off in two starts back for her current yard; can't be backed

nags.name: Carlovian
nags.rp_comment: Continued in good form since winning in the mud early last month and goes on the shortlist

nags.name: Harry's Ridge
nags.rp_comment: Has started favourite eight times from ten starts since handicapping; again holds claims

nags.name: Rose Bandit
nags.rp_comment: Fair 2yo; much her best effort of the season last time and is one to consider

nags.name: I'll Be Brief
nags.rp_comment: Maiden who's on a competitive mark down another 2lb; is a player in first-time headgear

nags.name: Star Cracker
nags.rp_comment: Landed course win number six last time; 3lb rise shouldn't hurt too much now back in form

nags.name: One One Seven
nags.rp_comment: Best on Tapeta and back in the groove last time; no reason why he won't give his running

nags.name: Cece Ceylon
nags.rp_comment: Regressive maiden who's run poorly in three starts back from a break

nags.name: Divine Queen
nags.rp_comment: Won well returned to 6f on soft ground yesterday; leading claims if turned out again

nags.name: Heartstar
nags.rp_comment: Four poor efforts since springing a surprise on turf in the summer; outsider

nags.name: Kibaar
nags.rp_comment: Nothing like as good as he was and wildly inconsistent now; looked flattered last time
